label: Portions of liturgical services including readings from the Gospels and Epistles (Greek and Arabic parallel)

work.desc_title: Portions of liturgical services including readings from the Gospels and Epistles (Greek and Arabic parallel)

contents.label: Portions of a prayer for those receiving the Eucharist, ff. 1r-15v
Service of the holy crown, ff. 78v-108v
Service for those who marry again, ff. 108v-116r
Prayer for the household of brides, ff. 116r-121r
Prayer for the bride and bridegroom before placing the crown on their heads, f. 121v (single column; no Greek)
Commandment after crowning the bride and groom, ff. 122v-127r (single column; no Greek)
Service for blessing the waters of the Nile River, ff. 127v-175v

note: Liturgical miscellany containing Baptism and Marriage Prayers, Genuflection Service, and an Ordo for Blessing Nile water before Pentecost
